Malvon â€” 0.0.1
This update includes a lot more changes than those mentioned below.

## New Features
- Horizontal Compact Toolbar
- Search Suggestions and history database
- New tab start page
- Smoother closing/opening animations

## Bugs (FIXED)
- Tab Group colors are displayed by default
- Tab closing logic updated
- Websites cannot override the Command-T, Command-W and Command-L shortcuts anymore.
